loans.name: Break Through Group

texts.en:
Rehema, who is in her mid 30s, is married with one child who goes to school. She has had a business of selling fish for eight years now. She works from 7 a.m to 10 p.m daily and is able to make a fair monthly profit.

This will be her 1st loan from Tujijenge Tanzania which she wants to use for buying more stock of fish to sell. Her dream is to one day be able to buy land.

She will share this loan with her loan group "Break Through" which has a total of 17 members who will hold each other accountable for paying back their loans.

loans.use: to buy more stock of  fish to sell.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Jacob

texts.en: Jacob is married and blessed with one child. He manages a retail shop and has run a green grocer for the last five years to make a living. He also rents out houses to earn extra income. He has employed one person to help him to manage the business. In the next five years, he wants to become more financially stable. Since he decided to join Faulu Kenya, he has been able to improve his living standard. With 40,000 Kenya shillings, he wants to buy sugar, vegetables and a weighing machine.

loans.use: to buy sugar, vegetables and a weighing machine.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase socks, children's dresses, trousers and blouses.

loans.name: Sulait

texts.en: Sulait needs a loan to plant tea, and buy fertilizer and manure for his tea plantations. Aged 32 years, he hails from Kyenjojo District and is a father of three children, ages 1 through 6, with whom he lives together with their mother in a semi-permanent house. Having started with an acre of tea inherited from his father, he has over time acquired land and he now has 6 acres of tea plantation.

loans.use: to plant tea, and buy fertilizer and manure for his tea plantations

loans.name: Robert

texts.en: Robert is a 35-year-old Ugandan who hails from Kyenjojo district in Uganda. He deals in timber sales and is married with 3 children, ages 7 through 13, living in his own permanent house. He faces a problem of fuel prices that leads to high costs of operation. He has been in this business for 10 years, having gotten his initial capital from the sale of tea which he still grows. Robert intends to use the loan to buy timber for resale.

loans.use: to buy timber for resale.

loans.name: Christopher

texts.en: Christopher wants a loan to complete construction of a commercial building. He deals in motorcycle transportation and the business has been very profitable. Aged 30 years, he hails from Kyenjojo District and is a father of three children, ages 2 through 6, with whom he lives together with their mother in a permanent house. His major challenge is accidents and his desire is to diversify and venture into the renting business.

loans.use: to complete building a commercial building.

loans.name: Zacarias

texts.es: El señor Zacarías es agricultor y maestro plomero y también su esposa lo ayuda con las actividades agrícolas. Con el dinero del crédito cubrirá el costo de una motobomba de agua para así mejorar la producción de tubérculos. Vive en casa propia ubicada en la localidad de Vicarani en la provincia Aroma;  es casado y no tiene  hijos. Es la primera vez que el cliente obtiene un crédito
texts.en:
Sr. Zacarías is a farmer and master plumber. In addition, his wife helps with the farming activities. The money from this loan will cover the cost of a water pump so that he can improve his production of tubers. Zacarías lives in his own home in the town of Vicarani in Aroma Province. He is married and has no children.

This is the first time he has obtained a loan.

loans.use: to buy a water pump.

loans.name: Asane

texts.en:
Asane is a Ugandan man age 40 who needs a loan to buy soap for resale. He hails from Kyenjojo district and is a father of four children between 6 months and 8 years old. 

For six years, Asane has been operating a retail shop after saving money from farm produce sales. He dreams of growing his business to a wholesale business and educating his children.

loans.use: to buy soap to resell.

loans.name: Regina

texts.en: Regina is a hardworking business woman. She is 25 years old and blessed with one child who is still in school. For the last five years, she has been managing a retail shop to earn a living. She also farms to earn extra income. She has retained her business because of the good reputation with her customers. In the next five years, she wants to manage a wholesale business. She is requesting a loan of 20,000 Kenya shillings (KES) to buy sugar, maize flour, and cooking fat.

loans.use: To buy sugar, cooking fat, and maize flour.

loans.name: Bagrat

texts.en:
Bagrat is 50 years old. He lives in the village of Charnali, Khelvachauri district. Bagrat is married and lives with his wife Leila, two daughters (18 and 17 years old), a son (13 years old) and an 80-year-old mother. His elder daughter is a student and the younger children go to school. 

Bagrat works in local security service. Along with his main job, he is actively involved in his family's agricultural business. The family owns a milk cow and sells dairy products in the village. Also they have 0.8 hectare of land where different types of vegetables and fruits are grown. Harvested products are sold to the greengrocery retailers. The total average monthly income of the family is 680 Georgia Laris (GEL) (approximately $400 USD). 

Bagrat decided to start a small fish farm. He will grow the fish in a dam, which was created by Bagrat in his yard. Bagrat requested credit for purchasing young fish. After couple of months he will start sales of fish, and the family will get additional income. Part of the profit will be reinvested in the same business and the other part will be used for his family's well-being.

loans.use: to purchase young fish for his fish farm.

loans.name: Felipe

texts.es: El señor Felipe es agricultor y cuenta con la ayuda de su esposa.  Con el dinero del crédito cubrirá el costo de una motobomba de agua; la papa es su producto estrella y con la motobomba podrá mejorar los regadíos. Vive en casa propia ubicada en la localidad de Vicarani en la provincia 	Aroma; es casado y  no tiene hijos. Es la primera vez que el cliente obtiene un crédito.
texts.en:
Sr. Felipe is a farmer and has the help of his wife. The money from this loan will cover the cost of a water pump. Potatoes are his prized product and the water pump will help improve irrigation. Felipe lives in his own house in the town of Vicarani in Aroma Province. He is married and has no children.

This is the first time has obtained a loan.

loans.use: to buy a water pump to improve irrigation.

loans.name: Andrew

texts.en:
Andrew is Ugandan man, age 31, who needs a loan to buy sugar for resale. He hails from Kyenjojo district and is a father of four children between 2 and 12 years old.

For six years, Andrew has been running a retail shop, which has facilitated him in providing basics to his family. He dreams of growing his business to a wholesale business and educating his children.

loans.use: to buy sugar for resale.

loans.name: Feliciano

texts.es: El señor Feliciano es agricultor con al ayuda de su esposa e hijos. Con el dinero del crédito cubrirá el costo de una motobomba para mejorar la producción de papa y quinua. Vive en casa propia ubicada en la localidad de Vicarani en la provincia  Aroma; es casado y tiene dos hijos. Es la primera vez que el cliente obtiene un crédito, pues el análisis financiero indica que cuenta con los recurso necesarios para el repago de la deuda.
texts.en:
Sr. Feliciano is a farmer and has the help of his wife and children. The money from this loan will cover the cost of a water pump so that he can improve his production of potatoes and quinoa. Feliciano lives in his own home in the town of Vicarani in Aroma Province. He is married and has two children.

This is the first time he has obtained a loan. The financial analysis indicates that he has the necessary resources to repay this debt.

loans.use: to buy a water pump.

loans.name: Apollo

texts.en:
Apollo is a Ugandan man, age 30, who needs a loan to buy sugar for resale. He hails from Kyenjojo district and is a father of three children between 6 months and 10 years old. 

Apollo has been running a retail shop business for five years, despite challenges of price fluctuation. His dreams are to own a wholesale business and educate his children.

loans.use: to buy sugar for resale.

loans.name: Justina

texts.es: La señora Justina es agricultora y también teje frazada y aguayos (son tejidos hechos de hilo y sirven para envolver, cargar, etc.), con estas actividades cubre los gastos. Con el dinero del crédito cubrirá el costo de una motobomba para mejorar sus cultivos. Vive en casa propia ubicada en la localidad de Vicarani en la provincia Aroma; es casada y no tiene hijos. Es la primera vez que la cliente obtiene un crédito.
texts.en:
Sra. Justina is a farmer who also weaves blankets and “aguayos” (woven cloths that are used for wrapping and carrying items). These activities enable her to cover her expenses. The money from this loan will be used to cover the cost of a water pump so that she can improve her crops. Justina lives in her own home in the town of Vicarani in Aroma Province. She is married and has no children.

This is the first time she has obtained a loan.

loans.use: to buy a water pump for improving her crops.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a sewing machine and fabric

loans.name: Julius

texts.en: Julius is a 43-year-old father of four children aged from 8 to 24 years old.  He hails from Kyenjojo District and is has been operating a retail shop for four years.  He plans to use the proceeds from this loan to buy soda for resale.  His dream is to own a wholesale business, and he would like to be able to pay for his children's education.

loans.use: to buy soda for resale

loans.name: Daniel

texts.en: Daniel is married and blessed with four children, all of whom attend school. He has been tailoring to earn a living. He is also employed. He has retained his business because of a good reputation with his customers. He has employed two people to help him manage the business. In the next 5 years, he wants to expand his business. He is requesting a loan of 15,000 Kenyan shillings to buy a sewing machine. Thanks to Faulu Kenya, he has been able to manage the business with a previous loan.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy onions, tomatoes and potatoes

loans.name: Juan Santiago

texts.es: El señor Juan vive junto a su esposa, La Sra. María, en la zona de Chinchaya que esta ubicada a 40 minutos del centro de la ciudad. Esta zona es muy conocida por que es un lugar cálido y tiene varios ríos donde los pobladores como el Sr.  Juan se dedica al lavado de arena y piedras.   Él es nacido en la localidad de Cala-Cala pero vive en Chinchaya desde hace bastante tiempo, su actividad de arenero se basa en el lavado de arena y piedras en el rio, la arena la divide en dos clases, la arena fina y las arenas corrientes y ambas junto a la piedra son utilizadas en construcción.  El Sr.  Juan  solamente saca la arena y la vende por cubos a los volqueteros de las zonas vecinas, trabaja con la institución  desde hace varios años y durante todo ese tiempo siempre demostró ser una persona muy responsable y cumplida con los pagos de sus cuotas.  Para esta ocasión solicita el préstamo del dinero para pagar la mitad de la compra de un terreno en la misma zona donde el vive y trabaja.
texts.en:
Sr. Juan lives with his wife, Sra. María, in the District of Chinchaya which is located 40 minutes away from the central part of the city. This area is well-known for being a warm place that has several rivers where residents such as Sr. Juan can wash sand and stones. He was born in the town of Cala-Cala but he has lived in Chinchaya for some time. His sand business involves washing the sand and stones in the river. The sand is divided into two categories, fine and ordinary. Both types of sand, along with the stones, are used in construction. Sr. Juan only packages the sand and sells it in buckets in the neighboring areas.

He has worked with Emprender for several years and during this time he has always demonstrated that he is very responsible and thorough with his loan payments. On this occasion, Juan is requesting a loan so that he can pay half of the purchase price for a piece of land in the same area where he lives and works.

loans.use: to buy a piece of land.

loans.name: Luis Ramon

texts.es: Luis,necesita un nuevo préstamo, el cual utilizara para comprar herbicidas para las plagas, semilla y abono, ya que su cultivo en pipian y papaya, esta por iniciarlo nuevamente, este cultivo es muy sensible a los daños que pueden caudar algunas plagas o insectos, por eso siempre debe incurrir en gastos para la prevencion de cualquier daño en los cultivos, espera que sus cosechas sean abundantes y sanas, Luis a traves de los prestamos es como ha logrado salir adelante, ya que los frutos que trabaja requiere mucho cuido y gasto, por esta razon la ayuda financiera que ha recibido ha sido su mejor opcion.
texts.en: Luis needs a new loan. He will use it to buy herbicides against pests as well as seeds and fertilizer. He grows squash and papaya and is about to plant them again. These crops are very sensitive to damage that can be caused by by some pests and insects. Because of this he always has to incur costs   to prevent damage to his crops. He hopes that his harvests will be abundant and healthy. With the loans, Luis has been able to get ahead, since the products he works with require a lot of care and expense. That is why the financial help he has received has been his best option.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, herbicides, and squash and papaya seeds.

loans.name: Justino

texts.es: El señor Justino se dedica a la confección y  producción de deportivos de 2 piezas "buzos y chaquetas" en su taller  propio el cual se encuentra en su domicilio, se dedica a esta actividad hace  6 años,  vive junto a su esposa e hijos, su domicilio es propio ubicado en la zona periurbana de la ciudad en la zona sud de Cochabamba carretera antigua a Santa Cruz; el préstamo que solicita es para realizar la compra de material de trabajo "tela"  que comprara para la producción de poleras y otros pedidos;  el señor indica que el crédito le ayudara de gran manera para incrementar su producción, ya que tiene muchos pedidos que entregar, el es una persona muy trabajadora, su deseo es poder tener un taller mas grande contratar mano de obra y  entregar sus pedidos a los diferentes departamentos de Bolivia, se encuentra feliz por la oportunidad que le brindan y agradecido con la institución por el apoyo.
texts.en:
Justino makes and produces two-piece track suits in his own shop located in his home.  He has been doing this work for six years.

He lives with his wife and children in his own home, located in the peri-urban area of the city in the southern part of Cochabamba, old highway to Santa Cruz.

The loan he is requesting is to buy work material--fabric--which he will buy to produce shirts and other orders.  He indicates that the loan will help him greatly increase his production, since he has many orders to deliver.

Justino is a very hardworking person.  He wants to be able to have a bigger workshop, hire help, and deliver his orders to different departments in Bolivia.  He is happy for the opportunity that is offered to him and grateful to the institution for the support.

loans.use: to buy fabric.

loans.name: Ana Cecilia

texts.es:
Ana, nuevamente esta solicitando un préstamo, el cual utilizara para surtir mas el negocio,  para tener variedad, comprando un pedido D. perfumeria para uso D. damas y caballeros, ademas D. antitranspirantes, cremas perfumadas, ella por ser mayorista, estos prestamos son su gran ayuda porque adquiere la mercaderia cancelandola al mismo tiempo que la recibe, a sus clientes pequeños le brinda mercaderia al credito, con estos pagos que recibe logra pagar las cuotas.
Ana ha logrado mantener el negocio surtido a traves D. los prestamos, han sido su fortaleza para darle vida al negocio.
texts.en:
Ana is asking for a loan which she will use to further stock her business in order to have variety. She will buy an order of mens' and women's perfume as well as anti-perspirant, and scented creams, since she is a wholesaler. These loans are a big help because she acquires the merchandise and pays for it at the same time she receives it. She offers merchandise to her smaller customers on credit and with the payments she receives makes her payments. 

Ana has been able to keep her business stocked through the loans. The have been the strength that has given life to her business.

loans.use: to buy perfumes, antiperspirants, and creams.

loans.name: Ana Eva

texts.es:
Ana, vive con su esposo y dos nietos 5 y 8 años de edad, ademas de una hermana, ella tiene un taller costura (vestidos, faldas, blusas, lo inicio hace 18 años,lo heredo de sus padres, trabaja de lunes a domingo.
El crédito lo necesita para comprar materiales de costura (Telas, agujas, botones, alfileres), de esa forma tendrá lo necesario para poder trabajar y entregar a tiempo las costuras a sus clientes, dando un buena imagen de su trabajo, y ganando mas clientela.
El sueño de Ana, es cada día mejorar sus ganancias y mejorar la calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Ana lives with her husband, two grandchildren ages 5 and 8, and a sister. She has a tailoring workshop (dresses, skirts, blouses). She started it 18 years ago, after inheriting the business from her parents. She works from Monday to Sunday. 

She needs the loan to buy tailoring materials (fabric, needles, buttons, pins). This way, she will have what she needs to work, and deliver sewing projects to her customers on time; enhancing her reputation as a tailor, and winning her more customers. 

Ana's dream is to improve her earnings each day, and improve her family's quality of life.

loans.use: To buy fabric, needles, buttons, and pins.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To replace tires, lights, and paint his mototaxi.

loans.name: Mario Fidel

texts.es:
Don Mario tiene 30 años de edad, es un comerciante de mariscos desde hace siete años quien vive con su esposa y sus cinco hijos.
 Él distribuye a toda la zona oriental, lo que son pescados y camarones generalmente a restaurantes, el cliente se levanta todos los días por la madrugada para llegar a las playas y comprar los  mariscos frescos y comprar por mayoreo. 
Luego visitan los restaurantes que con anterioridad le han hecho pedidos para dejar el producto. Él se moviliza en un vehiculó que compro de la venta de mariscos y con mucho esfuerzo lo han ido pagando con responsabilidad y puntualidad lo que él mismo menciona le hace sentirse muy orgulloso porque entiende la importancia de tener un record excelente en sus créditos. 
Don Mario necesita su préstamo, para contar con fondos y comprar el producto que comercializa pero en cantidades grandes para poder venderlo por libra y de esta forma obtener ganancia que le ayuden al sustento diario de sus hijos y esposa. 
Él es sumamente conocido en la zona y tiene muchas amistades que le compran mariscos. Uno de sus objetivos primordiales en la vida es darle a sus hijos una buena educación y con ello asegurar que en el futuro puedan defenderse y tengan la oportunidad de superarse cosa que él no tubo por circunstancias de la vida.
texts.en:
Don Mario is 30, and lives with his wife and five children. He has been selling seafood for seven years. He distributes to all of the eastern region; fish and shrimp, mostly to restaurants. He gets up every day early in the morning, to get to the beaches and buy fresh seafood at wholesale. Then he visits the restaurants that have previously put in orders for him to deliver his product. 

He gets around in his vehicle that he bought from the proceeds of his seafood sales. He has been gradually paying it off with a lot of effort, being responsible and on time with his payments. He himself comments that this makes him feel very proud; because he understands the importance of having an excellent record with his loans.  

Mario needs his loan in order to have working capital and to buy the product he sells; but in large quantities so that he can sell it by the pound. This way he earns profits that help him support his wife and children from day to day.  He is extremely well-known in the area, and has a lot of friends who buy seafood from him. 

One of his fundamental aims in life is to provide his children with a good education, and that way make sure that they can get by in the future, and have the opportunity to improve themselves; something that he didn't have because of his circumstances in life.

loans.use: To buy more fish.

loans.name: Rosendo

texts.es: El señor Rosendo es agricultor; su esposa lo ayuda con las actividades agrícolas. Lo que más se produce es la quinua. Con el dinero del crédito cubrirá el costo de una motobomba par agua que servirá mucho para el cultivo. Vive en casa propia ubicada en la localidad de Vicarani en la provincia Aroma; es casado y no tiene hijos. Es la primera vez que el cliente obtiene un crédito.
texts.en:
Sr. Rosendo is a farmer. His wife helps him with the farming activities. The crop that he produces the most is quinoa. With the money he requested, Rosendo will pay the cost of a water pump that will be of great help to his crop. He lives in his own home in the town of Vicarani in Aroma Province. Rosendo is married and has no children.

This is the first time he has obtained a loan.

loans.use: to buy a water pump for improving his crops.

loans.name: Julia

texts.es:
Doña Julia sigue trabajando en su negocio de venta de productos lacteos, y juegos nintendo, siendo sus entradas economicas. 
Ella ha sufrido mucho, pues el año pasado por accidente su unico hijo murio. Vacio que no logra llenar y que se esfuerza para sobresalir adelante, por la gracia de Dios.
Hoy con este nuevo financiamiento sera para comprar lacteos en crema, cuajada, queso. Productos de coca cola, asi como dara mantenimiento a una maquina de juego de nintendo. Para seguir ofreciendo calidad de servicio.
texts.en:
Doña Julia continues working in her business of selling dairy products and offering Nintendo games as her source of financial income.  She has suffered greatly since the death of her only son from an accident last year.  This is a void that she is not able to fill, but she strives to move forward.  

Today with this new loan she will buy dairy products such as cream, curds, and cheese.  She will also acquire Coca-Cola products and pay for the maintenance of one of her Nintendo machines so that she can continue offering quality service.

loans.use: to pay for maintenance of a Nintendo machine as well as purchase cream, curds, cheese, and soft drinks.

loans.name: Nilda

texts.es: La señora Nilda se dedica a la elaboración de masitas las mismas que las comercializa y vende. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de insumos como ser: harina, levadura, azúcar y otros para continuar con negocio. Vive en casa  de sus padres la misma queda ubicada en la zona  Cotahuma de la Ciudad de La Paz; es soltera y tiene dos hijos. Nilda se encuentra muy satisfecha con los créditos que se le otorgaron anteriormente, pues esta es la tercera vez que requiere de Kiva para el fondeo.
texts.en:
Sra. Nilda makes and sells pastries. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy supplies such as flour, yeast, sugar, and other ingredients so that she can continue her business. Nilda lives at the home of her parents in the District of Cotahuma in the city of La Paz. She is single and has two children.

Nilda is very satisfied with the previous loans that have been provided. This is the third time she has requested funds through Kiva.

loans.use: to buy flour, yeast, sugar, and other ingredients.

loans.name: Manuel Mercedes

texts.es:
Manuel, vive en casa propia con su esposa y tres hijos, él se dedica a la fotografía, lleva 6 años dedicándose a este oficio, realiza la toma de fotografías y videos en eventos sociales, su esposa le apoya para cualquier ocasión.
Actualmente está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de papel fotográfico, cuadros de vidrio y madera, también darle mantenimiento a su equipo, este préstamo le ayudara para comprar los materiales necesarios y darle continuidad al negocio.
La aspiración de Manuel es que su foto estudio mejore, tener todo lo necesario para atender la demanda, y en su familia pues quiere apoyar a sus hijos en todo lo posible.
texts.en:
Manuel lives in his own home with his wife and three children. He has been a photographer for six years. Manuel takes photographs and videos at social events. His wife helps him with any occasion.

He is currently requesting a loan to buy photography paper, glass and wood frames, as well as pay for maintenance of his equipment. This loan will help him buy the necessary materials so that he can continue his business.

Manuel’s aspirations are to improve his photography studio, have everything he needs to keep up with demand, and to support his children in everything as much as possible.

loans.use: to buy photography paper, glass and wood frames, as well as pay for maintenance of his equipment.

loans.name: Sofia

texts.es: La señora Sofia es agricultora y también vende jugos de frutas los fines de semana en la localidad de Patacamaya. Con el dinero del crédito cubrirá el costo de una motobomba para mejorar sus cultivos de papa y quinua. Vive en casa de sus padres  ubicada en la localidad de Vicarani en la provincia Aroma; es soltera y no tiene  hijos. Es la primera vez que Sofia obtiene un crédito a través de Kiva e IMPRO.
texts.en:
Sra. Sofia is a farmer and also sells fruit juices on the weekends in the town of Patacamaya. The money from this loan will cover the cost of a water pump so that she can improve her potato and quinoa crops. Sofia lives at her parents’ house in the town of Vicarani in Aroma Province. She is single and has no children.

This is the first time Sofia has obtained a loan through Kiva and IMPRO.

loans.use: to buy a water pump to improve her crops.

loans.name: Celso

texts.es: El señor Celso, trabaja  como chofer y su esposa es comerciante. El crédito lo requiere para la instalación  de gas a domicilio que se está realizando en su barrio. Vive en casa propia ubicada en la zona San Pedro  de la ciudad de La Paz; es casado y tiene dos hijos. El cliente se encuentra muy satisfecho con os créditos que se le otorgaron anteriormente ya que pudo mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia. Esta es la primera vez que su crédito es canalizado a través de Kiva.
texts.en:
Sr. Celso works as a chauffeur and his wife is a merchant. The loan he is requesting will be used to install a gas connection in his home since this utility work is being performed in his neighborhood. Celso lives in his own home in the District of San Pedro in the city of La Paz. He is married and has two children.

Celso is very satisfied with the loans he received previously since they have helped to improve his family’s quality of life. This is the first time his loan is being referred to Kiva for funding.

loans.use: to pay for the installation of a gas connection to his house.

loans.name: Lidiya

texts.ru: Лидия решила взят этот кредит для закупки женских курток и пальто, так как не хватило своих собственных средств. Благодаря предыдущему кредиту Лидия смогла расширить ассортимент за счет женских сарафанов и платьев и получить дополнительную прибыль. Она улучшила жилищные условия и  приобрела кондиционер.
texts.en: Lidiya decided to take out this loan to buy women's jackets and coats because she did not have enough of her own financial means. Thanks to the previous loan Lidiya was able to expand the variety of the merchandise with women's sundresses and summer dresses and received an additional profit. She has improved her living conditions and bought an air conditioner.

loans.use: to purchase winter clothing.

loans.name: Oscar Alberto

texts.es:
Oscar, vive con su esposa y dos hijos, él se dedica a vender sorbetes, paletas y sorbeletas  en el centro de la ciudad, ya tiene experiencia  no tiene un horario establecido de lunes a sábado
El préstamo lo necesita para comprar producto como: paletas, sorbetes, vasitos, de esa forma tendrá surtira de diferentes sabores de helados el negocio, con la esperanza de que la clientela acepte los prductos y aumente su demanda.
La aspiracion de oscar es que a traves del negocio pueda ofrecer a su familia todo lo necesario para la vida diaria.
texts.en:
Oscar lives with his wife and two children. He sells sorbets, popsicles, and other frozen treats in the central part of the city. Oscar already has experience, but he does not work according to an established schedule. His business operates Monday through Saturday.

The loan he is requesting will be used to buy popsicles, sorbets, and cups so that he will have different flavors of frozen treats for his business. He hopes that customers like his products and that demand will increase. His aspiration is that his business will enable him to provide everything his family needs for their daily living.

loans.use: to buy sorbets, popsicles, and cups.

loans.name: Maura

texts.es:
Doña Maura sigue creciendo y vendiendo en su pulperia, que gracias a la buena voluntad y esfuerzo, ha logrado la estabilidad del negocio, trata de mantener al cliente sastifecho mediante la variedad de producto. De sus dos hijos uno esta trabajando como docente y el menor sigue cursando sus estudios universitarios. 
Contando con el apoyo moral y economico de su esposo quien labora en una empresa estatal del estado en servicios publicos.
Con su credito anterior, compro productos para la pulperia, pues su proposito es aumentar cada dia, ya que los  costos de la universidad de su hijo es alto , y desea apoyarlo hasta lograr el objetivo,
Hoy con su nuevo financiamiento seguira invirtiendo varios quintales de arroz, frijoles, azucar, maiz, bidon de aceite, caja de jabon de lavar ropa, de lavar traste y de uso personal, ace, productos lacteos, asi como cosmetico en desoraunte, shampoo, gillet, entre otros productos que son
texts.en:
Doña Maura continues to grow and sell in her business. Thanks to her willingness and effort, she has been able to achieve a stable business. Maura tries to keep her customers satisfied by offering a variety of products. Of her two children, one is working as a teacher while the younger one continues to finish at the university. Maura has the moral and financial support of her husband, who works at a state-owned business that provides public services.

With her previous loan, Maura bought products for her store with the intent of increasing her business each day. The cost of her son’s university is already high, so she wants to support him in this objective. Today her new loan will be invested in several “quintales” (1 quintal = 46 kg) of rice, beans, sugar, corn, drums of oil, boxes of laundry soap, dishwashing soap, body soap, detergent, dairy products, cosmetics, deodorants, shampoos, razors, and other products.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Sirley

texts.es: La señora Sirley tiene y atiende una librería en la casa donde vive. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de material de construcción ya que realizara la refacción de la cocina de la casa donde vive. Vive en casa de sus padres la misma queda ubicada en la zona de Llojeta en la Ciudad de La Paz; es casada y tiene dos hijos. Esta es la segunda vez que solicita crédito a través de Kiva.
texts.en:
Sra. Sirley manages a bookstore in her home. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy construction materials so that she can repair the kitchen in her home. Sirley lives at her parents’ house in the District of Llojeta in the city of La Paz. She is married and has two children.

This is the second time she has requested a loan through Kiva.

loans.use: to buy construction materials for repairing the kitchen in her home.

loans.name: Gilberto

texts.es:
Gilberto tiene 38 años, es un hombre muy responsable y trabajador, es soltero y vive con su sobrino en su casa propia, en donde día a día realiza múltiples actividades para poder mejorar su calidad de vida.
El trabajo de Gilberto consiste en la siembra y cosecha de palma aceitera, trabajo que lo realiza desde ya 4 años, es así que se va muy temprano todos los días a su chacra en donde revisa como va el crecimiento y trata de mantener limpia sacando la mala hierva que crece. Para él éste trabajo es importante ya que le permitió solventar su hogar, además que puede apoyar a su sobrino, quien en ocasiones trabaja cuidando la chacra. Cuando hay mucha demanda de trabajo contrata peones para acelara más rápìdo su trabajo. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que tiene tiempo para poder realizar algunas otras actividades, le esta yendo bien porque al igual que los demás agricultores sus productos se vende a buen precio. Este será el sexto crédito con MFP, por lo que espera el apoyo de todos ustedes para continuar trabajando. Con el monto solicitado de 1200 soles, comprará sacos de abono para su plantación de palma, además contratará peones para que lo ayuden a limpiar su chacra.
texts.en:
Gilberto, age 38, is a responsible and hardworking gentleman. He is single and lives with his nephew in his own home. Every day he engages in multiple activities in order to improve his quality of life. Gilberto’s work consists of cultivating and harvesting palm oil. He has been in this line of work for four years. Gilberto leaves early every day for his farm where he monitors the growth of his crops and maintains them by clearing out any harmful weeds. His work is important because it allows him to maintain his household and support his nephew, who occasionally does work around the farm. Whenever there is great demand for his product, Gilberto hires laborers in order to accelerate the completion of the work. What he enjoys about his job is having the time to pursue a few other activities. Like other farmers, Gilberto is doing well because he is able to sell his products at a good price.

This will be his sixth loan with MFP. Gilberto hopes to receive everyone’s support so that he can continue working. The loan of 1200 PEN that he requested will be used to buy sacks of compost for his palm tree plantation. In addition, he will hire laborers to help clear his farm.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of compost and to hire workers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clothing: pants, shirts, and blouses to sell.

loans.name: Javier

texts.es: El señor Javier es empleado en un alojamiento (un pequeño hotel) donde realiza trabajos de mantenimiento. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de una computadora para su casa. Con esta actividad de empleado cubre los gastos de su familia. Vive en casa de sus padres la misma queda ubicada en la zona de sopocachi en la Ciudad de La Paz; Javier es soltero y tiene tres hijos.
texts.en:
Sr. Javier is an employee at a small hotel where he performs maintenance work. The loan he is requesting will be used to buy a computer for his home. Through his employment, he is able to cover the family expenses. Javier lives at his parents’ house in the District of Sopocachi in the city of La Paz.

He is single and has three children.

loans.use: to buy a computer for home use.

loans.name: Orlando

texts.es:
Orlando, se ha decidido nuevamente por un prestamo, ya que esta iniciando el cultivo de maiz y frijol, en esta ocasion esta iniciando los preparativos para la tierra, necesita comprar abono y herbicidas, este como otros prestamos le han servido para contar con los insumos necesarios, y gracias a Dios ha logrado mantener buenas cosechas.
Esta contento con su trabajo y espera que este nuevo cultivo sea igual de provechoso. En la actualidad continua vendiendo pan y estudiando en la universidad.
texts.en:
Orlando has decided, once again, to take out a loan, since he is beginning to cultivate corn and beans. At present, he has begun to prepare the land and needs to buy manure and herbicides. This loan, like his previous ones, will be used to buy necessary inputs. Thanks to God, he has been able to achieve good harvests.

Orlando is content with his work and hopes that this new planting will be equally successful. At present, he continues to sell bread and study in the university.

loans.use: to buy manure and herbicides for cultivating corn and beans.

loans.name: Nataliya

texts.ru:
Наталья берет кредит на покупку спортивных костюмов к осени и зиме. Погода похоладала и нужно срочно завезти теплый товар. У натальи по-прежнему две торговые точки, которые удобно расположены и привлекают новых клиентов.
Наталья проживает с мужем и двумя дочками в 2-х комнатной квартире, условия проживания хорошие, семья дружная.
texts.en: Nataliya is taking out the loan to purchase sports suits for the autumn and winter. The weather is now colder and she needs to stock up on warm merchandise as soon as possible. Nataliya still has two vendor locations which are conveniently located and attract new customers. Nataliya lives with her husband and two daughters in a two bedroom apartment, the living conditions are good and her family is friendly.

loans.use: to purchase warm sports suits.

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
Don Juan Carlos se ha dedicado solo  a su pequeño   negocio de Carne de res, pues, dejo de laborar en Zona Franca, lo que con la liquidacion y financiamiento en Afodenic, ha crecido en su negocio. Al comprar mas carne en cantidad, su clientela se ha mantenido y hay mas encargos, tambien ahora vende verdura.
Su esposa lo apoya con las ventas y sus tres hijos siguen cursando el año escolar.
Y se siente sastifecho al lograr el objetivo de sus ventas. ya que como plan es seguir dando mejores condiciones de vivienda  a su familia.
Con este nuevo prestamo sera para invertir en carne de res, como; posta, lomo, carne de pecho, asesina, hueso para sopa, corazon, riñones, medulas, hubre, entre otros, siendo lo mas demandado por sus clientes.
texts.en:
Don Juan Carlos has a business selling beef. He left his job in the Free Trade Zone and used his severance pay and a loan from AFODENIC to grow his business. He plans to buy more meat in large quantities so that he can maintain his customer base. Juan Carlos has many orders and also sells vegetables now. His wife helps him with making sales and their three children are continuing to finish the school year. He is very pleased to have reached his sales goals and plans to continue improving the living conditions of his family.

With this new loan, Juan Carlos will invest in cuts of beef such as round steak, tenderloin, brisket, jerky, bones for soup, hearts, kidneys, brains, udders, and other parts that are in great demand among his customers.

loans.use: to buy various cuts of beef in large quantities.

loans.name: Carlos

texts.es:
El señor Carlos tiene 54 años de edad, es casado con tres hijos.

Él se dedica a la agricultura desde los once años de edad, su abuelo fue quien le enseño a trabajar, ya que su papá murió cuando él a penas tenia dos años. A la edad de veinte años aprendió dos oficios: la carpintería y la elaboración de silos de maíz, para alimentar el ganado. Don Carlos todos los años siembra maíz, ya que es su medio de subsistencia. En este momento él tiene sembrado maíz y fríjol, todos los días se levanta a las 4:00 a.m. de la mañana a trabajar y cuidar sus cultivos, librándolos de plagas para que den buenos frutos.

Don Carlos necesita de insumos, para que sus cultivos se puedan desarrollar, por lo que se traslada a la ciudad en busca de ellos, para llegar ahí tiene que caminar de su comunidad hasta un pueblo donde aborda un bus.

Él solicita un préstamo a Fundación Campo, para comprar abono, fertilizantes y una bomba para fumigar contra las plagas, para el desarrollo de sus frutos, ya que actualmente lo necesitan urgentemente. Con el préstamo el saldrá a tiempo para no perder los frutos, ya que a través de ellos, él lleva el sustento a su hogar y le enseña a su hijo como llevar el pan de cada día a su familia.

Don Carlos, espera poder darles a su esposa e hijos todo lo necesario antes de que envejezca y que sus hijos estudien y sean personas de bien a la sociedad y a la comunidad a la que pertenecen.
texts.en:
Sr. Carlos is 54 years old, married, and has three children.

He has been farming since he was 11 years old. His grandfather was the person who taught him how to work since his father died when he was barely two years old. When he turned 20, Don Carlos learned two trades: carpentry and making corn silos for storing cattle feed. He grows corn every year since this is how he earns his livelihood. At the moment, he is growing corn and beans. He wakes up every day at 4am so that he can work and take care of his crops so that they will be free of pests and produce good output.

Don Carlos needs supplies so that his crops can develop. He travels to the city in search of these supplies. In order to get there, he must walk from his community to a town in order to get aboard a bus.

He is requesting a loan from Fundación Campo in order to buy compost, fertilizers, and a pump sprayer so that he can fumigate against pests so that his crops can develop. This is already an urgent need. By receiving his loan on time, he will not lose his harvest. As a result of producing his crops, Carlos is able to sustain his household and teach his son how to earn a daily living for his family.

Don Carlos hopes to give his wife and children everything they need for their old age and their children’s education so that they will be good members of society and the community where they live.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies such as compost, fertilizers, and a pump sprayer.

loans.name: Alla Tanou Group

texts.fr:
Mme W.P.Rolande est la représentante du groupe ALLA TANOU. Elle est mariée et mère de 01 enfant. Il a 05 ans et va à l’école. Elle a 02 personnes en charge.

Elle est coiffeuse depuis 06ans. Elle s’approvisionne au marché du secteur 23 en ville. Ses clients sont les femmes.

Elle veut s’acheter 05 cartons de mèches pour son salon de coiffure.

Mme économise ses bénéfices pour agrandir son salon. Elle ambitionne amélioré son activité et prendre soin de son enfant.
texts.en:
W.P. Rolande is the representative of the "Alla Tanou" group. She is married and the mother of one child. He is 5 years old and goes to school. She has two people dependent on her.

She has been a hairdresser for 6 years. She stocks up at the sector 23 market in town. Her clients are women.

She would like to buy 5 boxes of hair extensions for her hair salon.

She is saving up her profits so that she can expand her salon. Her goal is to improve her business and to care for her child.

loans.use: to purchase 5 cartons of hair extensions for her hair salon.

loans.name: Hermenegildo

texts.es:
Hermenegildo, vive con su esposa y seis hijos, él se dedica desde hace muchos años a la siembra de granos básicos: maíz y frijoles, realiza las actividades todos los días de lunes a domingo.
El necesita el préstamo para comprar fertilizantes como herbicidas, semilla y abono, para que sus cosechas sean abundantes y estén libres de plagas dandole mejores cosechas para obtener mejores  ingresos para la familia.
El sueño de Hermenegildo es que sus hijos sigan estudiando y que en un futuro sean profesionales  y de esa forma ayudar con los gastos de la casa.
texts.en:
Hermenegildo lives with his wife and six children. He has been growing basic staples, such as corn and beans, for many years. Hermenegildo engages in his farming activities every day, Monday through Sunday.

He needs a loan to buy fertilizers, herbicides, seeds, and compost so that his harvest will be abundant and free from pests. By improving his harvest, he will generate more income for his family.

Hermenegildo dreams of seeing his children continue their studies so that they can become professionals in the future and help with the household expenses.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, herbicides, seeds, and compost.

loans.name: Gerardo

texts.es: Gerardo tiene 49 años, es un hombre bueno y muy honesto, convive con su pareja y es madre D. tres hijos D. 19, 16 y 15 años. Juntos habitan en su casa propia junto a su pareja, con quien trabaja duro para poder dar una mejor calidad D. vida a sus hijos. El trabajo D. Gerardo consiste en el sembrío D. palma aceitera y D. cacao, productos que son llevados a una fabrica muy granD. D. L. región y a los mayoristas que vienen D. L. ciudad D. Lima. Él tiene su propia tierras, lugar donD. se encuentran estos productos, y por lo que sus hijos y su pareja lo ayudan en el trabajo. Tiene 34 años realizando este trabajo, y difruta el ver que trabaja a lado D. su familia, además que deja éstos conocimientos agrarios a sus hijos. Él manifiesta que le esta yendo muy bien, pues al principio empezó con el cultivo D. cacao, pero ahora su negocio esta creciendo y hace año y medio inicio L. siembra D. palma. Este será el quinto crédito con MFP, por lo que espera el apoyo D. cada uno D. ustedes. Con el monto solicitado D. 3000 soles, podrá contratar peones para que se encargen D. cuidar y limpiar su planta aceitera.
texts.en:
Gerardo, age 49, is a good and honest gentleman. He lives with his partner who is the mother of their three children (ages 19, 16, and 15). They live together in their own home. Gerardo and his partner work hard to proviD. a better quality of life for their children. His work consists of producing palm oil and cacao. These products are taken to a large factory in the region and to wholesalers who come from the city of Lima. Gerardo has his own land on which he grows these products. His children and his partner help with the work.

Gerardo has been in this line of work for 34 years and enjoys working alongsiD. his family. In addition, he is able to pass his farming knowledge on to his children. He says that he is doing well since he started growing cacao, but now his business is growing as a result of planting palm trees a year and a half ago.

This will be his fifth loan with MFP and he hopes to receive everyone’s support. The amount of 3000 PEN that he requested will be used to hire workers who will be charged with caring for and weeding his oil-producing crops.

loans.use: to hire workers to help with the farm work.

loans.name: Monika

texts.ru:
Моника решила воспользоваться кредитом, так как решила закупить больше товара за один раз.
Она приобрела женские спортивные костюмы, штаны на осень и зиму, кофточки теплые, женскую обувь на осень, а также 2 свадебных платья (под заказ).
Благодаря прошлому кредиту у Моники выросло количество товара, однако слишком много осталась у нее  летней одежды, которую продавать сейчас она уже не может. Таким образом часть прибыли осталась в товаре до следующего сезона.
Моника надеется, что этот зимний сезон будет лучше, чем летний, что она сможет получить дополнительную прибыль и улучшить свои жилищные условия.
texts.en: Monika decided to take out a loan because she decided to purchase more merchandise at once. She bought women's sports suites and pants for the autumn and winter, as well as cardigans, women's shoes for the fall and two wedding gowns (custom ordered). Thanks to the previous loan Monika's inventory has grown, but a lot of the merchandise from the summer is still left which she cannot sell right now. This way partial profit is locked in the merchandise until the next season. Monika hopes that this winter season will be better than the summer one and she will be able to get additional profit and improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase warm clothing for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy bread, rice, beans, sugar, and corn.

loans.name: Aracely Del Carmen

texts.es:
Doña Aracely sigue laborando para empresa zona Franca, pues tiene mas de dos años ya trabajando, en donde ha logrado ayudar a su esposo con los gastos y con la construccion de su propia casa.
Sus dos hijos estan estudiando uno en la universidad y el otro en la primaria, su esposo sigue dando el apoyo familiar y economico atraves de su labor como conductor.
Para doña Aracelly no ha sido facil, pero con muchos deseos de lograr el objetivo de dependizarce de sus padre, y tener lo propio.
Hoy con este nuevo prestamo sera para seguir levantando paredes y poner el techo, lo que espera pronto pasarce a su nuevo hogar. Materiales a comprar: piedra, arena, cemento, perlines, laminas de zinc, golosos, soldadura entre otros materiales para terminar la obra.
texts.en:
Doña Aracely continues working for the business in the free trade zone, as she has over two years working there now. By these means she has been able to help her husband with the expenses and with the construction of their own home. 

Her two children are students, one at the university and the other in elementary school. Her husband continues to provide family financial support through his work as a driver. 

It has not been easy for Doña Aracelly but she has a strong desire to achieve her objective of becoming independent from her parents and having something that is her own. Today this new loan will be for continuing the work on the walls and putting on the roof. She hopes to move into her new home soon. Materials to be purchased: stone, sand, cement, roof beams, zinc sheeting, screws and solder, among other materials for finishing the construction.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials in order to continue building concrete walls and installing the roof.

loans.name: Flor

texts.es: Flor tiene 28 años, es una mujer muy alegre y emprendedora, convive con su pareja y es madre de un niño de seis años, por quien trabaja día a día para poder brindarle una mejor calidad de vida. Juntos habitan en su casa propia en el distrito de Neshuya. EL trabajo de flor consiste en la siembra y cosecha del árbol de la palma, el cual es materia prima para la elaboración del aceite que es un principal insumo de la cocina. Ella tiene una chacra propia en donde realiza esta actividad por ya tres años aproximadamente, además que cuenta con la ayuda de su pareja. Pero cuando es temporada de cosecha, necesariamente debe contratar peones, quienes se encargaran de hacer la recolección de los frutos. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es que tienen tiempo para estar a lado de su hijo que aún es pequeño y necesita del cuidado de ambos. Le esta yendo muy bien en esta actividad, pues sus productos son vendidos a una fabrica de elaboración de aceite recibiendo buena paga por ello. Solo espera continuar y mas adelante cultivar cacao. Este será el sexto crédito con MFP, por lo que espera una vez más su apoyo. Con el monto solicitado, comprará sacos de abono, asimismo contratará peones para que le ayuden en la fertilización de sus tierras y éste lista para la próxima cosecha.
texts.en:
Flor, 28, is a very cheerful, enterprising woman.  She lives with her spouse and is the mother of a six-month-old little boy that she works hard to provide a better quality of life for.  They all live together in their own house in Neshuya District.  

Flor’s work consists in planting palm trees which are the raw material for making palm oil that’s a main cooking ingredient.  She has her own field where she’s been doing this activity for about three years; her spouse helps her.  However, during harvest season she needs to hire day workers who will do the harvesting.  

What she likes most about her work is that they have time to spend with their son who is still little and needs care from both of them.  She’s doing well in this activity because her products are sold to a factory that makes the oil and she is paid well for them.  She hopes to stay in business and to plant cocoa beans in the future.

This will be her sixth MFP loan and she’s hoping for your support once more.  She will use the requested amount to buy sacks of manure and will hire day workers to help her fertilize the soil so that it will be ready for the next planting.

loans.use: to buy sacks of manure and to hire day workers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy maize, beans and rice.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to expand the variety of merchandise.

loans.name: José Gilberto

texts.es:
Don José tiene 65 años de edad, vive con su compañera de vida y tres hijos.

Él se dedica a cuidar y trabajar con ganado, desde los quince años, fue su papá quien le enseño, pues él siempre le dijo que para llegar a tener algo se debe luchar y trabajar muy fuerte. Se levanta a las 4:30 a.m. de la mañana para ordeñar sus vacas, luego se dirige a cuidarlas, además siembra maíz y trabaja con su familia, elaboran tamales de elote y sus hijas se encargan de procesar la leche de las vacas en cuajada y la venden en la comunidad.

Para comprar los productos que necesita para desempeñar sus actividades, el señor José debe caminar a pie unos diez minutos, luego aborda un autobús durante diez minutos que lo lleva al lugar donde compra los insumos.

Don José solicita el préstamo, para comprar dos vacas lecheras, por que su familia procesa la leche y venden cuajada en la comunidad donde viven, además comprara alimento para sus vacas. Con la compra de dos vacas más, la producción de leche será mayor y tendrán más cuajada para satisfacer la demanda, por lo que abra mas ganancia y le servirá para satisfacer las necesidades de su hogar.

Él sueña con sacar adelante a su familia y planea ahorrar para dejarles a cada una de sus hijas un lote para que construyan su propia casa y seguir enseñándoles a trabajar, para que sus familias tengan mejor condición de vida.
texts.en:
José is 65 years old living with his spouse and three children.  He works with and cares for cattle; he’s been in business for 15 years.  His father taught him because he’d always say that one must work hard and struggle much if one is to have anything.  He rises at 4:30am to milk his cows and then heads out to care for them.  He also grows corn and works with his family making corn tamales.  His daughters process the cow milk into curds that’s then sold in the community.

To buy the products he needs to carry out his activities, José must walk for ten minutes to catch a bus that takes another ten minutes to reach the place where he buys his supplies.  José is requesting the loan to buy two dairy cows because his family processes the milk and sells the curd in the community where they live.  He will also buy feed for his cows.

The purchase of two more cows will increase milk production and they’ll have enough curd to satisfy demand which will lead to higher profits to meet household needs.  He dreams with moving his family forward to leave each of his daughters a lot so that they can build their houses and to continue teaching them how to work so that their families will have better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy two dairy cows.

loans.name: Natalina

texts.es:
Natalina D. 51 años D. edad, vive con su esposo e hijos en su casa propia, cuenta con servicio sólo D. luz, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito D. TambogranD., la cual pertenece al departamento D. Piura.  Esta zona se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola, ganadería  y artesanía.

Natalina desD. hace algunos años se dedica a la crianza y venta D. ganado ovino (cuenta con 40 cabezas D. ovejas), su corral se encuentra en la parte posterior D. su casa, el cual es apropiado y amplio, los alimenta con comida balanceada y pastos naturales para que sus animales lleguen a tener un crecimiento óptimo para qué pueda ofrecerlos en los diferentes mercados D. la zona y así obtenga muy buenas ganancias para solventar sus gastos diarios D. su familia. 

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa D. 2000 nuevos soles para comprar más animales D. otras especies y alimentos balanceados para los mismos, con los ingresos que obtenega pueda cubrir su crédito y mejorar la calidad D. vida D. su familia.  Natalina es una persona trabajadora y muy responsable que lo único que quiere es que su familia se supere y  que tenga mejoras económicas.
texts.en:
Natalina, 51, lives with her husband and children in her own house which only has electricity and is located in the rural part of TambogranD. District which belongs to Piura Department.  This zone is noted for farming, animal husbandry and crafts.

Natalina has been raising sheep to sell for several years (she has 40 head of sheep).  Her corral is located in her back yard and it’s appropriate and spacious.  She feeds them nutritionally balanced feed and natural grasses so that they will reach optimum development and be sold in various local markets obtaining good profits to cover her family‘s daily expenses.

She’s asked Edpyme Alternativa for a 2000 new sol loan to buy more animals of different species and nutritionally balanced feed for them.  With income earned she will be able to repay the loan and improve her family’s quality of life.  Natalina is a very hardworking, very responsible person.  The only thing she wants is that her family gets ahead and improves economically.

loans.use: to buy more animals of different species and feed for them.

loans.name: Odile A.

texts.fr: Mariée,Odile est mère de 2 enfants, tous scolarisés. Elle vit en couple avec son mari, chauffeur dans une entreprise de la place. Les dépenses du ménage sont supportées par le couple. Odile est distributrice de divers articles tels que les mèches, les habits pour bébé, les produits cosmétiques etc. Elle s'approvisionne dans les pays limitrophes au Bénin. Ses clients sont constitués des petits détaillants et le reste des articles est vendu dans les marchés de Cocotomey et Cococodji. Odile est à son 2ème crédit à FINADEV et sollicite un renouvellement pour renforcer sa capacité d'achat afin de mieux satisfaire sa clientèle. Le revenu supplémentaire généré par ce concours financier l'aidera à améliorer sa condition de vie et à mieux développer son activité.
texts.en: Odile is married and the mother of two children, both of whom are in school. She lives together with her husband, who works as a driver for a local business. The spouses jointly provide for household expenses. Odile is a vendor of various articles, such as hair extensions, baby clothing, cosmetic products etc. She stocks up in the countries neighboring Benin. Her clients are small retailers, and the rest of the goods is sold at the markets of Cocotomey and Cococodji. Odile is on her second loan with FINADEV. She  would like a new loan in order to increase her purchase volume and better meet customer demand. The additional revenues made possible by this financial support will allow her to improve her quality of life and  evelop her business further.

loans.use: to buy 30 dozens of hair extensions

loans.name: Maria Del Rosario

texts.es:
María, es madre de 4 hijos, de los cuales uno es dependiente, ella se dedica a la elaboración y venta de pan, desde hace 12 años realiza esta actividad como medio de obtener ingresos para la familia, quien le enseño a elaborar pan fue una tía y hoy en día realiza la venta de lunes a sábado.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de harina, royal, levadura, azúcar, esta inversión le ayudara para mantener en el inventario lo suficiente de materia prima, para continuar realizando sus ventas.
La aspiración de María es que el hijo que tienen a cargo, pueda sentir su apoyo y culminar los estudios, así como también continuar trabajando con préstamos.
texts.en:
María has 4 children, and only one of them depends economically on her. She has been baking and selling bread for 12 years, and she engages in this activity in order to earn money for her family. Her aunt taught her how to bake bread. She sells her products for Mondays to Saturdays.
She is requesting a loan to buy flour, baking powder, yeast and sugar: this investment will help her stocking up her inventory with the necessary raw ingredients she need to keep on baking and selling her products.
María wishes to continue providing for the son that depends on her, so that he can finish his studies; she also wishes to keep on working through the loans.

loans.use: To buy flour, baking powder, yeast and sugar.

loans.name: Walter William

texts.es:
Walter de 28 años, vive en su casa propia con su esposa e hijos, cuenta con servicio sólo de luz, ubicada en el distrito de Tambogrande que pertenece al departamento de Piura.  Esta zona se caracterizan por la actividad agrícola, ganadera y artesana.

Walter se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales de corral (ovejas y cerdos), desde hace 6 años, cuenta con sus corrales apropiados para sus animales, los alimenta con comida balanceada y pastos  naturales para engordarlos y pueda venderlos a sus clientes a un buen precio, obteniendo ingresos para solventar sus necesidades familiares.  

El negocio de Walter cada día crece más por lo que ha creído necesario solicitar un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 nuevos soles para comprar más alimento balanceado y sanidad de  sus animales, al tenerlos bien alimentados a sus animales tendrá mayores ventas y con los ingresos podrá cubrir su crédito otorgado, mejorando la calidad de vida de su familia y pueda ofrecerles otras oportunidades académicas a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Walter, 28, lives with his wife and children in his own house. The house, which has electricity, is located in the Tambogrande district, which is part of the department of Piura.  It is a region of agriculture, herding and handicrafts.

Walter has been raising and selling pen animals (sheep and pigs) for the last six years.  He has his own pens for his animals, and he gives them balanced feed and allows them to graze to fatten them so he can sell them to his clients at a good price and obtain the income he needs for his household expenses.

Walter's business has been growing day by day.  He is seeking a loan of 1000 new soles ($375)  from microfinance partner  Edpyme Alternativa to buy additional balanced feed and medicine for his animals; when they are well-fed, they sell better, and with that income he can pay off the loan, thereby improving his quality of life and making him able to offer better opportunities for schooling for his children.

loans.use: to buy more balanced feed and medicine for his animals.

loans.name: Jose Esgard

texts.es:
José de 21 años, es  soltero, vive en casa de sus padres, cuenta con servicio sólo de luz, ubicada en el distrito de Tambogrande que pertenece al departamento de Piura.  Esta zona se caracterizan por la actividad agrícola, ganadera y artesana.

José se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales de corral como ovejas y cerdos, desde hace un año, cuenta con sus corrales amplios para sus animales, los alimenta con comida balanceada y pastos  naturales para engordarlos y pueda venderlos a sus clientes a un buen precio, obteniendo ingresos para solventar sus obligaciones personales.  

La actividad que ejerce José cada día crece más por lo que ha creído necesario solicitar un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 nuevos soles para comprar más alimento balanceado y sanidad de  su ganado, al tenerlos bien alimentados a sus animales tendrá mayores ventas y con los ingresos podrá cubrir su crédito otorgado, mejorando su calidad de vida y brindarle mejores comodidades a sus padres.
texts.en:
Jose is 21, single, and lives at home with his parents. They only have electricity utilities, located in the Tambogrande district that belongs to the Piura department. This area is characterized by its agricultural activity, livestock farming, and artisans. Jose raises and sells farm animals such as sheep and pigs. 

Since a year ago, he has big enough corrals for his animals. He feeds them with balanced food and allows them to graze. This fattens them up so he can sell them to his clients at a good price, generating income to pay off his personal debts.

 The activity that Jose does daily grows more, so that he believes it necessary to request a loan from Edpyme Alternative for 1,000 Nuevos Soles to purchase more balanced food and invest in the health of his animals. Having them well nourished means better sales. With the income, he will be able to repay the loan, improve his quality of life, and provide better comforts to his parents.

loans.use: To purchase balanced food and invest in the health of his livestock.

loans.name: Silvia Liliana

texts.es:
Silvia, se dedica a la venta D. cosméticos, zapatos y ropa, trabaja todos los días D. la semana, esta venta la realiza a través D. catálogos y revistas, visita lugares como escuelas, empleados D. gobierno y hospitales, donD. asisten muchas personas y le hacen pedidos, actualmente esta solicitando un prestamo para la compra D. mercaderia: lociones, labiales, zapatos, maquillaje, y demas productos D. belleza.
Este prestamo es el segundo y le ayudan para fortalecer el negocio, compra mercaderia nueva lo que le permite mantener a los clientes satisfechos.
texts.en: Silvia sells cosmetics, shoes and clothing from catalogs and magazines. She works every day of the week, visiting places like schools, government employees and hospitals, where there are lots of people, and they place orders with her. Currently she is asking for a loan to buy merchandise: lotions, lipsticks, shoes, makeup and other beauty products. This is her second loan and will help her to strengthen her business by buying new merchandise which keeps her customers satisfied.

loans.use: to buy lotions, lipsticks and makeup.

loans.name: Donald

texts.es:
Don Donald sigue su labor como guarda de seguridad, pues son muchos años en este trabajo, su esposa trabaja ya que sus cuatro hijos cursan sus estudios.
Atraves de ahorros y financiamiento en Afodenic, ha logrado las mejoras a su casa, siendo de gran beneficio para sus hijos un techo seguro. Con el credito anterior logro terminar repello de paredes y hoy con esta nueva solicitud podra instalar el cielo razo en la parte del porche y en la parte de a fuera del porton hacer rampa para que se le haga mas facil la salida del vehiculo que tienen.
Contento por que ha sido posible a corto plazo las mejora de su vivienda.
texts.en: Don Donald continues working as a security guard which he has done for many years. His wife also works as they have 4 children at school. Through savings and financing by Afodenic, he has managed to make improvements to his house as a secure roof has been of great benefit to his children. With the previous loan, he managed to finish plastering the walls. Now with the new loan he will be able to install a flat roof over part of the porch and a car ramp outside his main gate to make it easier to drive out the vehicle they have. He is happy because it has been possible to make the improvements to his house in such as short period of time.

loans.use: to install a flat roof over part of the porch and a car ramp outside the main gate.

loans.name: Boud Nonguelone Group

texts.fr:
Mme Aminata est la représentante du groupe Boud Nonguelone. Elle est mariée et mère de 07 enfants. Le plus âgé a 28ans et le moins âgé a 1ans. Quatre(04) de ses enfants vont à l’école. Elle a 07 personnes en charge.

Elle vend de la farine et des gâteaux depuis 10ans. Elle s’approvisionne au marché du secteur 23 en ville. Ses clients sont les femmes, homme et les enfants.

Elle veut s’acheter 02 sacs de maïs pour la transformation en farine, 01 sac de farine de blé et un bidon d’huile pour la fabrication du gâteau.

Mme économise pour agrandir son commerce. Elle ambitionne construire une maison d’habitation dans leur cours et payer la scolarité de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Aminata is the representative of the "Boud Nonguelone" group. She is married and the mother of 7 children. The oldest is 28 years old and the youngest is 1 year old. Four of her children go to school. She has seven people dependent on her.

She has been selling flour and cakes for 10 years. She stocks up at the sector 23 market in town. Her customers are women, men and children.

She would like to purchase 2 sacks of corn to make flour, 1 sack of wheat flour and a can of oil to make cakes.

She is saving up to expand her business. Her goal is to build a dwelling place in their yard and to pay for her children's education.

loans.use: to purchase two sacks of corn to make flour, 1 sack of wheat flour and a can of oil to make cakes.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sugar, flour, and eggs.

loans.name: Claudia Yamileth

texts.es:
Claudia tiene 21 años de edad, esta acompañada, y es madre de una niña de cinco años.

Claudia se dedica al comercio desde hace seis años. Inicialmente ella empezó una tienda con pocos productos y poco a poco fue aumentando su inventario. Sin embargo, hasta la fecha su inventario no le es suficiente para satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes. Los fines de semana Claudia también elabora pupusas (plato típico salvadoreño) y tortas mexicanas (emparedados mexicanos).

Ella solicita un préstamo a Fundación Campo para mejorar el inventario de su tienda y para el negocio de elaboración de pupusas y tortas mexicanas. Con esto ella podrá suplir la demanda existente de sus clientes, por lo que mejorara sus ganancias, y por ende la calidad de vida de su familia. 

Claudia sueña con tener una tienda bien surtida para tener mayores ingresos. Ella planea ahorrar lo más que pueda para comprar un lote y construir su casa. Actualmente Claudia y su familia viven en casa de un familiar. Además, ella quiere que su hija estudie y se prepare para que su vida sea mejor.
texts.en:
Claudia is 21 years old and has a five-year-old girl.
 
For the last six years, she has dedicated herself to shopkeeping, as one day she realized she needed to do something to help with her family's day-to-day expenses and to help her partner with the household expenses.  She opened a shop with very little in it, but little by little, she increased her inventory, although it is not yet sufficient to satisfy her clients' demands.  On weekends, she also makes pupusas (savory corn cakes) and Mexican sandwiches.

To buy her products, she needs to travel to the city by bus.

Claudia is seeking a loan from microfinance partner Fundación Campo to invest in improving her shop and to support her business of making pupusas and Mexican sandwiches.  This will allow her to meet the demands of her clients and to increase her earnings and thus her family's quality of life; she wants to have an eatery, which will give her an opportunity to improve things day by day. 

Her dream is to have a well-stocked store, so she can have a higher income, and she is planning to save up to buy a plot of land and build a house, since at the moment she lives in a relative's home.  She also wants her daughter to study so she can have a better life.

loans.use: to buy more inventory for her store and to make Mexican sandwiches.

loans.name: Trabajando Para El Futuro Group

texts.es: La Sra. Georgina  es soltera, no tiene hijos y tiene 60 años, actualmente es integrante en la alcancía comunal “Trabajando para el Futuro” grupo  conformado por  7  socios que se dedican a diversas actividades D. comercio. Georgina trabaja desD. hace 15  años en la venta D. abarrotes y condimentos al por mayor, este negocio surge porque ella quería ayudar a sus padres a tener una mejor calidad D. vida ya que ella no tiene hijos, se hizo D. un capital e invirtió en abarrotes con el tiempo su negocio fue creciendo y empezó a vender al por mayor condimentos (ají molido, ajo molido, pimienta en polvo etc.) ,con el tiempo su negocio fue creciendo y se hizo muy conocida ahora cuenta con mayor clientela, gracias a su esfuerzo y dedicación a logrado mejores ingresos económicos, ha construido su casa, y su familia cuenta con una mejor calidad D. vida  con el fin D. seguir creciendo a solicitado un nuevo préstamo para comprar mercadería insumos fideos,arroz leche, aji. Sabemos que Georgina cumplirá sus metas con mucho trabajo y esfuerzo y que los préstamos D. Edaprospo le ayudaran.
texts.en:
Georgina is a single woman who doesn't have children and is 60 years old.  She is currently a member of the communal bank "Trabajando para el Futuro" ["Working for the Future"], a group maD. up of 7 partners that carry out various business activities.  

Georgina has been working for 15 years selling wholesale food products and seasonings.  This business came about because she wanted to help her parents to have a better quality of life since she doesn't have children herself.  She got together some capital and invested in food products, and in time her business began to grow. She began to sell wholesale seasonings (such as ground chili pepper, garlic powder, black pepper, etc.) and her business continued to grew and became very well known.  Now it has an even larger clientele, and thanks to her effort and dedication she has achieved better economic earnings. She has built herself a home, and her family has a better quality of life.  

With the objective of continuing to grow, she has requested a new loan in order to purchase merchandise and supplies such as noodles, rice, milk and chili peppers.  We know that Georgina will achieve her goals with a lot of hard work and effort and that the loans from Edaprospo will help her succeed.

loans.use: to purchase supplies (noodles, rice, milk).

loans.name: Francisco Edmundo

texts.es:
Francisco, vive con su esposa y sus  dos hijos 12 y 17 años de edad, él se dedica a cultivo de maíz y frijoles desde hace treinta  años  y trabaja de promotor de salud en una clínica, de lunes a viernes y los sábados y domingos se dedica a los cultivos junto con su hijo mayor.
El préstamo lo utilizara para comprar abono, fertilizantes y semillas, para iniciar la siembra, espera que con estos insumos le dará mejor producción, obtener más ingresos al venderlo al mercado y dejar una parte para el consumo de su familia.
El sueño de Francisco es apoyar a sus hijos en sus estudios, darles lo necesario para que vivan mejor y en mejores condiciones.
texts.en:
Francisco lives with his wife and his two children, aged 12 and 17. For the past thirty years he has grown corn and beans for a living. He also works as a health promoter in a clinic from Monday to Friday and on Saturday and Sunday he looks after the crop cultivation with his eldest son.

He will use the loan to buy organic and chemical fertilizers and seeds to start off the sowing season. He hopes that this will improve production, increasing his income when he sells at market and at the same time leave some for his family.
 
Francisco’s dream is to support his children in their education, giving them what they need so that they will live better lives, in better conditions.

loans.use: to buy organic and chemical fertilizers and seeds.

loans.name: Martha Del Socorro

texts.es:
Doña Martha sigue con sus ricas venta de tortillas, el cual ha aumentado sus ventas y con sus ganancias ha logrado poner una pequeña pulperia en donde vende una variedad de productos, pues ahora tambien cuenta con la ayuda economica de su hijo mayor quien labora como albañil y aporta cada mes.
Pues con este nuevo financiamiento, sera para comprar productos para la pulperia en granos basicos de arroz, frijoles, azucar, maiz, leña, productos lacteos, golosinas y productos de aseo personal. Los cuales son mas vendidos y consumidos por sus clietes. 
Para ella es de gran sastifaccion poder tener otra entrada economica fija, y el poder ir mejorando en lo personal, solventando los compromisos con mas estabilidad. Entre sus planes siempre espera mantener su puesto de venta de tortillas.
texts.en:
Doña Martha continues to sell her delicious tortillas, the sales of which have increased. With the profits she has managed to set up a small grocery store where she sells a variety of products as she now also has the financial support of her eldest son who works as a bricklayer and brings home money every month.

The new loan will be used to buy products for the grocery store such as dry grains, rice, beans, sugar, corn, firewood, dairy products, confectionary and personal care products which are the most sought after and used by her customers.

It is greatly satisfying for her to be able to have another fixed source of income and improve on a personal level, resolving in a more stable manner commitments made. Among her plans she always plans on keeping her tortilla selling stall.

loans.use: to buy products for her small grocery store as well as continue to sell tortillas.

loans.name: Candida Rosa

texts.es: Cándida Rosa tiene 54 años, su actividad es la venta de mercadería en general. Hace más de 2 años que tiene este ingreso, ella inicio vendiendo en la casa pocos productos pero logro ver que en su vivienda no obtenía muchos clientes fue así como ella decide invertir cada más en nuevos productos para atraer la atención de sus clientes. El motivo del crédito es para la compra de bolsos, calzado, cremas, ropa en general, cosméticos entre otros.
texts.en: Cándida Rosa is 54 years old. She sells general merchandise. She has been doing this for more than 2 years and started off selling a few products at home. However, she saw that at home she didn't attract many customers and so she decided to invest each month in new products to attract the attention of her customers. The reason for the loan is to buy bags, lotions, clothes in general, cosmetics and the like.

loans.use: to buy bags, shoes, lotions, clothes in generaal, cosmetics and the like.

loans.name: Milagro De La Concepcion

texts.es: Milagro De La Concepción tiene 32 años, su actividad es la venta de mercadería en general. Hace más de 6 años que tiene este negocio, día a día Milagro tiene que mantener a su familia, el objetivo del crédito es para la compra de calzado, cremas, perfumes, ropa en general, prendas de oro laminado, plata, bolsos entre otros. Esta no es la primera vez que realiza financiamientos pues ya tiene varios y han sido de gran ayuda con su negocio.
texts.en: Milagro De La Concepción is 32 years old. She sells general merchandise and has been doing this for more than 6 years. Every day, Milago has to take care of her family. The purpose for the loan is to buy footwear, perfume, clothes in general, rolled gold jewelry, silver, bags and the like. This is not the first time she has asked for financing as she has several loans and they have helped her greatly with her business.

loans.use: to buy footwear, creams, perfume, clothes in general, rolled gold jewelry, silver, bags and other

loans.name: Manuel Ernesto

texts.es: Manuel Ernesto tiene 25 años, su actividad es una pulpería. Tiene más de 8 años en este negocio. Inicio como una fuente de ingreso necesaria para su familia, Manuel es un hombre que a diario con su familia pasan por muchas necesidades él con este medio de ingreso quiere mejorar las condiciones básicas de su hogar. El solicita el crédito con el fin de comprar granos básicos, detergentes, refrescos, pan, galletas, golosinas, entre otra variedad de productos.
texts.en: Manuel Ernesto is 25 years old and he has a grocery store. He has been doing this for more than 8 years. He set up the business so as to have a source of income for his family. Manuel and his family go through a lot every day. With the store as a means of income, he wants to improve the basic conditions of his home. He is asking for the loan for the purpose of buying dry grains, detergents, beverages, bread, biscuits, sweets, and a variety of other products.
