loans.name: Santack Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité est créé le 29 MAI 2001. Il est  constitué de 19 femmes qui habitent le même village. Leur activité principale est le commerce. 

Madame Fatoumata qui est à la droite de la photo levant la main est responsable de groupe. Elle est âgée de 44 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de deux enfants. 

Elle s’active dans la vente de boutique villageoise. Elle a une bonne expérience dans ce domaine d’activité, pour l'avoir pratiquée depuis plusieurs années.

Ce prêt lui permettra de renforcer son capital en achetant du savon, du thé, du sucre etc.. et de mieux développer  son activité.

Les profits lui permettront de renforcer ses épargnes et de payer le scolarité de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Santack Group was established on May 29, 2001. It is made up of 19 women who live in the same village. Their main business is buying and selling.

Mrs. Fatoumata is responsible for the group. She's the one raising her hand, on the far right in the photograph. She's 44 years old, married, and the mother of two children.

For many years, she's been selling products in a village shop and thus has a good experience in this domain.

This loan will enable her to bolster her working capital and develop her business, by buying soap, tea, sugar, etc.

The profits will enable her to strengthen her savings and pay her children's school expenses.

loans.use: to buy soap, tea, sugar, etc

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to procure beans, rice and other items to cook to sell.

loans.name: Lucy

texts.es: Lucy, de 44 años, es una mujer alegre y trabajadora, convive con su pareja en su casa propia, fruto de ésta unión  tiene 4 hijos, por quienes educa y alimenta, del mismo modo brinda su apoyo a una sobrina, quien vive también con ella. Ella se dedica a la fabricación de palos de escoba, trabajo que lo realiza en un local que alquila y en donde tiene todos las herramientas necesarias. Tiene 15 años dedicada a dicha actividad, la cual la  realiza con el apoyo de su conviviente y dos ayudantes, de esta manera ofrece trabajo y un ingreso de dinero a otras personas las cuales están muy agradecidas. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que se siente muy contenta con el bien que realiza a su comunidad creando empresa y desarrollo, animada por la demanda que tiene su producto se siente con el deseo  de seguir creciendo y ampliar su negocio para llegar a otras zonas más lejanas. Este será el segundo crédito con MFP, le gusta el grupo que forma parte ya que todos se conocen y siempre están al pendiente de lo que le pueda pasar a los otros. Con el monto solicitado, comprará madera en mayor cantidad y a un menor precio generándole mayor ganancias,
texts.en:
Lucy, age 44, is a cheerful and hardworking woman. She and her partner live in their own home. They have four children who they feed and provide an education. Lucy also supports a niece who lives with them.

Lucy makes broom handles and works in a rented workshop where she has all the necessary equipment. She has been in this business for 15 years and has the help of her partner and two assistants. Lucy provides employment, so the people who work for her are grateful that they have an income. What she enjoys most about her work is knowing that she is helping her community and encouraging local development. She is excited about the demand for her product, so she wants to continue growing and expanding her business to other distant places.

This will be her second loan with MFP. Lucy enjoys being part of her group because all of the members know her and are always looking out for one another. The amount she requested will be used to buy wood in large quantities and at a lower price so that she can generate more profits.

loans.use: to buy wood in bulk for making broom handles.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy lip pencils, crèmes, treatments, shampoo, nail polish, and other products.

loans.name: Diamoral Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité est créé le 29 MAI 2001. Il est composé de quinze femmes qui habitent le même village. Leur activité principale est le commerce.

Madame Fatou qui est à la droite de la photo levant la main et le responsable de groupe. Elle est âgée de 54 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de dix enfants. Elle a aussi en sa charge un enfants confié par son frère.

Elle s’active dans la vente de poissons séchés. Elle a une bonne expérience dans ce domaine d’activité, pour l'avoir pratiquée depuis plus de six ans.

Ce prêt lui permettra d'accroitre ses revenu en achetant plus de marchandises (poissons séchés)

Les bénéfices lui permettront de soutenir son mari dans la prise en charge de la famille.
texts.en:
This solidarity group was set up on 29th May 2001. It is made up of 15 women who live in the same village. Their main activity is trading.

Fatou, who is on the right of the photo with her hand raised, is in charge of the group. She is 54 years old, married and mother to ten children. She also has another child entrusted to her care by her brother.

She has a fish-selling activity and has good experience in this domain having done it for more than six years.

This loan will enable her to increase her income by buying more stock (dried fish). The profits she makes will allow her to help her husband provide for the family.

loans.use: to buy dried fish

loans.name: Anita

texts.es: Anita se dedica a la venta de cosméticos desde hace 5 años, aprendió este negocio porque no tenía un trabajo estable pues tiene que mantener a sus dos hijos de 13 y 19 años. El motivo del crédito es para la compra de lápiz labial, cremas, tratamientos, perfumes, shampoo, ropa interior, prendas de plata y oro laminado. Anita sueña con brindarle a sus hijos la oportunidad que puedan asistir a una universidad y puedan ser personas preparadas.
texts.en:
Anita has been selling cosmetics for five years. She learned this business because she did not have a stable job in order to support her two children, ages 13 and 19.

This loan will be used to buy lip pencils, crèmes, treatments, perfumes, shampoo, undergarments, and silver and gold-plated jewelry. Anita dreams of providing her children the opportunity to attend the university so that they can become prepared individuals.

loans.use: to buy lip pencils, crèmes, treatments, perfumes, shampoo, undergarments, and silver and gold-plated jewelry.
